00029 #ifndef _plx9054reg_h_
00030 #define _plx9054reg_h_
00031 
00032 struct plx9045reg {
00033         U32 LAS0RR, LAS0BA, MARBR, BIGEND_LMISC_PROT_AREA;
00034         U32 EROMRR, EROMBA, LBRD0, DMRR;
00035         U32 DMLBAM, DMLDAI, DMPBAM, DMCFGA;
00036 /* 30 */
00037         U32 OPQIS, OPQIM, _dummy1, _dummy2;
00038 /* 40 */
00039         U32 IQP, OQP, MBOX2, MBOX3;
00040         U32 MBOX4, MBOX5, MBOX6, MBOX7;
00041         U32 P2LDBELL, L2PDBELL, INTCSR, CNTRL;
00042         U32 PCIHIDR, PCIHREV, MBOX0, MBOX1;
00043 /* 80 */
00044         U32 DMAMODE0, DMAPADR0, DMALADR0, DMASIZ0;
00045         U32 DMADPR0, DMAMODE1, DMAPADR1, DMALADR1;
00046         U32 DMASIZ1, DMADPR1, DMACSR0_DMACSR1, DMAARB;
00047         U32 DMATHR, DMADAC0, DMADAC1, _dummy3;
00048 /* c0 */
00049         U32 MQCR, QBAR, IFHPR, IFTPR;
00050         U32 IPHPR, IPTPR, OFHPR, OFTPR;
00051         U32 OPHPR, OPTPR, QSR, _dummy4;
00052 /* f0 */
00053         U32 LAS1RR, LAS1BA, LBRD1, DMDAC;
00054 };
00055 
00056 struct plx9054_dmadesc {
00057         U32 pcistart, localstart, size, next;
00058 };
00059 
00060                                /* to clear the interrupt you must ... */
00061 #define plxirq_mbox     (1<< 3) /* read the mailbox */
00062 #define plxirq_pci      (1<< 8)
00063 #define plxirq_doorbell (1<< 9) /* clear the doorbell bits */
00064 #define plxirq_local    (1<<11) /* clear the local irq source */
00065 #define plxirq_dma0     (1<<18) /* clear the dma status bits */
00066 #define plxirq_dma1     (1<<19) /* clear the dma status bits */
00067 
00068 #define plxirq_doorbell_active (1<<20)
00069 #define plxirq_dma0_active     (1<<21)
00070 #define plxirq_dma1_active     (1<<22)
00071 
00072 #endif
